trans-unit.source: Represents an element that has a value within a specific range.
trans-unit.target: 특정 범위 내에 값이 있는 요소를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> that can be set between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 컨트롤에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 사이로 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the user can interactively set the value; in other cases, the value can be set only programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 경우에 따라 사용자 값; 설정할 대화형으로 수 있습니다. 다른 경우에는 값을 프로그래밍 방식 으로만 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 설정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, 하지 않고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" /> class.

Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> 컨트롤의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" />에서 더하거나 뺄 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> to add to or subtract from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" /> element.
A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: 상속 되는 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 이 속성을 사용 하는 방법을 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 클릭할 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 속성 증가 또는 값을 감소 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> commands on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가을 호출할 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> 에 있는 명령을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> 의 값에서 슬라이더 변경 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
Gets or sets the highest possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the range element.
trans-unit.target: 범위 요소에서 사용 가능한 가장 높은 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The highest possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the range element.
trans-unit.target: 범위 요소에서 사용 가능한 가장 높은 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 이 속성의 메타 데이터를 재정의 하 고 해당 기본값 10으로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 100.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> 이 속성의 메타 데이터를 재정의 하 고 해당 기본값 100으로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> controls such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 와 같은 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> 상속 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the range element.
trans-unit.target: 범위 요소에서 사용 가능한 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> controls such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 와 같은 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> 상속 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> to provide a new <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> function.
trans-unit.target: 하위 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 재정의 하는 대신 값 속성이 변경 될 때 응답 하도록이 메서드를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> 새 수 있도록 <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> 함수입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 [종속성 속성 콜백 및 유효성 검사](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> to provide a new <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> function.
trans-unit.target: 하위 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 재정의 하는 대신 값 속성이 변경 될 때 응답 하도록이 메서드를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> 새 수 있도록 <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> 함수입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 [종속성 속성 콜백 및 유효성 검사](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> to provide a new <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> function.
trans-unit.target: 하위 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 재정의 하는 대신 값 속성이 변경 될 때 응답 하도록이 메서드를 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> 새 수 있도록 <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> 함수입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Callbacks and Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 [종속성 속성 콜백 및 유효성 검사](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-callbacks-and-validation.md)를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.OnValueChanged%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.OnValueChanged%2A> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 재정의 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.OnValueChanged%2A> 파생된 클래스에서 호출 해야 기본 클래스의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.OnValueChanged%2A> 메서드 등록 된 대리자가 이벤트를 받도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> to be added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" /> control.

<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> to add to or subtract from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" /> element.
A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: 상속 되는 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 이 속성을 사용 하는 방법을 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 클릭할 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 속성 증가 또는 값을 감소 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseSmall%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseSmall%2A> command on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가을 호출할 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseSmall%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseSmall%2A> 명령을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> 의 값에서 슬라이더 변경 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
Provides a string representation of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" /> object.
Returns the string representation of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase" /> object.

This method returns a string that provides the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 값을 제공 하는 문자열을 반환 하는이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: 범위 컨트롤의 현재 크기를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The current magnitude of the range control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control visually indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property in some way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 컨트롤 시각적으로 나타냅니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 어떤 방식으로든에서 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the slider and scrollbar controls have a thumb that is synchronized with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 슬라이더 및 스크롤 막대 컨트롤와 동기화 된 엄지 단추에는 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 컨트롤의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> to a number that is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 설정한 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 이 번호를 보다 작은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> to a number that is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 설정한 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 숫자로 보다 크면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the range value changes.
